The difference with this ending, however, is that when the gold crown drops into the water, and The Old Monkey picks it up and places it on The Destined One's head, there will be a flash where The Destined One opens his eyes.
img_below_text: You'll then see an illustration of Wukong's life, starting with him fighting Erlang. As The Destined One is not shown inside the rock before the credits roll, it suggests that The Destined One was worthy all along and that the cycle begins anew.
